Benchmark.title: Oracle Linux 7 Security Technical Implementation Guide
Benchmark.description: This Security Technical Implementation Guide is published as a tool to improve the security of Department of Defense (DoD) information systems. The requirements are derived from the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) 800-53 and related documents. Comments or proposed revisions to this document should be sent via email to the following address: disa.stig_spt@mail.mil.

Profile.title: CAT I Only
Profile.description: This profile only includes rules that are Severity Category I.

Value.title: remember
Value.description: The last n passwords for each user are saved in /etc/security/opasswd in order to force password change history and keep the user from alternating between the same password too frequently.

Value.title: ucredit
Value.description: Minimum number of upper case in password

Value.title: ocredit
Value.description: Minimum number of other (special characters) in password

Value.title: minlen
Value.description: Minimum number of characters in password

Value.title: minclass
Value.description: Minimum number of categories of characters that must exist in a password

Value.title: maxrepeat
Value.description: Maximum Number of Consecutive Repeating Characters in a Password

Value.title: maxclassrepeat
Value.description: Maximum Number of Consecutive Repeating Characters in a Password From the Same Character Class

Value.title: lcredit
Value.description: Minimum number of lower case in password

Value.title: difok
Value.description: Minimum number of characters not present in old password
Value.warning: Keep this high for short passwords

Value.title: dcredit
Value.description: Minimum number of digits in password

Value.title: Account for auditd to send email when actions occurs
Value.description: The setting for action_mail_acct in /etc/audit/auditd.conf

Value.title: Sensible umask
Value.description: Enter default user umask

Value.title: minimum password age
Value.description: Minimum age of password in days
Value.warning: This will only apply to newly created accounts

Value.title: maximum password age
Value.description: Maximum age of password in days
Value.warning: This will only apply to newly created accounts

Value.title: Maximum concurrent login sessions
Value.description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions by a user

Value.title: Maximum login attempts delay
Value.description: Maximum time in seconds between fail login attempts before re-prompting.

Value.title: number of days after a password expires until the account is permanently disabled
Value.description: The number of days to wait after a password expires, until the account will be permanently disabled.
Value.warning: This will only apply to newly created accounts

Value.title: net.ipv6.conf.all.accept_source_route
Value.description: Trackers could be using source-routed packets to generate traffic that seems to be intra-net, but actually was created outside and has been redirected.

Value.title: net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts
Value.description: Ignore all ICMP ECHO and TIMESTAMP requests sent to it via broadcast/multicast

Value.description: Disable IP source routing?

Value.title: net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects
Value.description: Disable ICMP Redirect Acceptance?

Value.description: Trackers could be using source-routed packets to generate traffic that seems to be intra-net, but actually was created outside and has been redirected.

Value.title: net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects
Value.description: Disable ICMP Redirect Acceptance

Value.title: SSH session Idle time
Value.description: Specify duration of allowed idle time.
